title: 09/06 Fantasy Football Podcast: KC-NE, RB Help, Bold Predictions!
description:
Our last "preseason" show of the year has a little bit of everything. Of course we get started with the latest on Ezekiel Elliott (2:30) before transitioning to some RB help (6:40) for those of you who were planning on starting anyone in the TB-MIA game ... Most added players (15:33), why adding Malcolm Mitchell makes sense (23:00), a thorough breakdown of KC-NE (29:30) and much more ... It's time for bold predictions (51:10) on Paul Perkins, Ty Montgomery, Kelvin Benjamin and more. Plus we give our NFL division, wild card and Super Bowl picks late in the show ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
